root.description: Bonus ModesIn Discipline: record of an Crusade there are 4 bonus modes in which you can revisited unlocked events.CG ModeWatch regular CGWatch CharactersWatch certain backgroundsBGM ModeListen to any of the game's 22 songs.Album ModeRevisited the sex scenes you have already unlocked, there are a total of 36 scenes to revisit.Ending CheckShows you which endings you managed to get.System RequirementsCPU Pentium 166 MHz minimum, Pentium II 233 MHz recommendedRAM 32 MB but 64MB and higher recommendedInstall 200 minimum but 800 MB or more HDD recommendedDisplay 640x480 w/ 16-bit colourSound 16-bit Sound CardTriviaDiscipline: The Record of a Crusade uses the same game engine as Bible Black.
